NULL, records wrote .

Export to xlsx — kindle_write_xlsx
text: Export xlsx

title: Export to xlsx — kindle_write_xlsx
code: kindle_write_xlsx(   data,   file,   columns = NULL,   distinct = TRUE,   drop_na = TRUE,   new_line = TRUE,   title = NULL )

title: Export to xlsx — kindle_write_xlsx
text: data data read kindle_read(). file file name write . columns character vector. Select reorder variables data frame. Choose following values: id: row number. title: Name book. page: number page excerpt book. begin: starting position excerpt book. end: ending position excerpt book. datetime: time excerpt took . text: Excerpted content. distinct Logical. TRUE, last record begin value retained; FALSE, records deleted. drop_na Logical. TRUE, drop rows text column NA; FALSE, records deleted. new_line Logical. TRUE,   replaced \n can create new line. title String. Provide title data want write , support regular expressions. NULL, records wrote .

title: Export to xlsx — kindle_write_xlsx

what: Send a message to DingTalk robot — send_message_ding
title: Send a message to DingTalk robot — send_message_ding
text: function sends message DingTalk robot using provided webhook URL.

title: Send a message to DingTalk robot — send_message_ding
code: send_message_ding(   message,   include_timestamp = FALSE,   at_mobiles = NULL,   at_all = FALSE )

title: Send a message to DingTalk robot — send_message_ding
text: message message content send. include_timestamp Whether include current timestamp message. Default FALSE. at_mobiles character vector mobile numbers mention message. Default NULL. at_all Whether mention users message. Default FALSE.

title: Send a message to DingTalk robot — send_message_ding
code: if (FALSE) { options(webhook_ding = "https://oapi.dingtalk.com/robot/send?access_token=YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN") send_message_ding("Hello, World!") send_message_ding("Code execution completed.", include_timestamp = TRUE,  at_mobiles = c("1234567890", "0987654321")) send_message_ding("Code execution completed.", include_timestamp = TRUE, at_all = TRUE) }

stfun 0.1.22
text: 对 read_es_query() 中 tidyselece 部分进行修改以通过 R CMD check。

title: stfun 0.1.21
text: Added read_es_query(), facilitates reading tidying Elasticsearch query results tibble.

title: stfun 0.1.20
text: Added warn = FALSE readLines(con) remove warning using format_input().

title: stfun 0.1.19
text: Modified function name quote_text() format_input() introduced two additional parameters: type, determines whether quotation marks included, sep, governs formatting output.

title: stfun 0.1.18
text: Improved progress() function longer display task progress 100% task completed.

title: stfun 0.1.17
text: Add quote_text() function wrap column strings double quotes commas can used input functions (e.g., c()).

title: stfun 0.1.16
text: Add extract_highlights() extract highlighted sentences Markdown file. Now can easily identify collect important sentences enclosed ** analysis presentation.
